title: Battle Angel Alita, Vol. 1
description: Yukito Kishiro blurs the lines between human and machine in the sci-fi/action adventure Battle Angel Alita.Daisuke Ido, a talented cybernetic doctor, finds the head of a cyborg in a junk heap. When he rebuilds her body, Alita's only clue to her past surfaces-her deadly fighting instincts! And now she is determine to find out the truth about who she once was...
author: Yukito Kishiro
